title: Hilary Mantel: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: Join the winner of the 2012 Man Booker Prize, Hilary Mantel, as she discusses her winning book, and what it's like to win the most prestigious prize in literature.

itunes:summary: Join World-Record holder and four-time Olympic Champion sprinter Michael Johnson as he discusses his career, his best selling book Gold Rush and his upcoming apps.
